name: Vandal
description:
The Museum art is quite outdated, and clearly needs some refreshment.

Vandal broke in the museum to do some art on art, but beware, there are 3 guards patrolling the premises.

Play with your friends in a 3v1 multiplayer split-screen game. Try to deface as much of the art in the museum as possible and escape the museum before the guards catch you.

Controls:

WASD / Left-joystick: Movement

Arrows / Right-joystick: Look Around

Space / x Button: Jump

Temporary Controls:

G: Guards close-range attack
